data.title: KKHSOU Admission 2024: July Application (Out), Date, Eligibility
data.meta_description: KKHSOU Admission is now accepting admission applications. Interested candidates can apply for various programs offered by the university.
data.text:
KKHSOU Admission 2024 Application Form has been Released for Various Courses. Krishna Kanta Handiqui State Open University (KKHSOU), located in the heart of Guwahati, Assam, stands as a pioneering institution in the realm of open and distance learning in India.

Established through the Assam Legislative Assembly’s Act XXXVII of 2005, and receiving assent from the Governor in the same year, KKHSOU officially began its academic journey in 2006. The University Grants Commission (UGC) recognized it in 2009, acknowledging its foundation year as 2007. KKHSOU offers a broad spectrum of academic programs, including undergraduate, postgraduate, diploma, and certificate courses across humanities, social sciences, commerce, management, science, technology, and professional fields like law, journalism, and mass communication.

This wide range of offerings is tailored to meet the educational needs and aspirations of a diverse student body, encompassing both traditional learners and working professionals seeking to enhance their skills and qualifications. KKHSOU admission process is designed to be flexible, accommodating students from all walks of life. As KKHSOU continues to grow and evolve, it remains steadfast in its mission to foster an environment of academic excellence and lifelong learning.

KKHSOU Admission 2024 Notification – Application Released

KKHSOU Admission 2024 Highlights

Krishna Kanta Handique State Open University (KKHSOU) offers a range of facilities and opportunities to ensure a comprehensive educational experience. Here are some key highlights:

The admission schedule for KKHSOU admission varies each year. It is recommended to visit the official website of KKHSOU for the most up-to-date information regarding admission dates and deadlines. Keep an eye out for the announcement of admission schedules to ensure you get all the important dates for applying to your desired courses at KKHSOU.

January Session:

August Session:

KKHSOU Admission 2024 Application Form

KKHSOU 2024 Application Form has been Released for Various Courses. KKHSOU Admission is inviting applications for undergraduate and postgraduate programs for 2024-25. Aspiring students can now submit their applications for courses such as BA, BCA, BCom, MA English, MA Assamese, and MBA, among others. The application form can be accessed online on the official KKHSOU website.

Applicants need to ensure they meet the eligibility criteria before submitting their forms. Scanned copies of necessary documents, along with passport-size photographs and signatures, must be attached. Online fee payment options are available, and a printed copy of the application form should be retained for future reference.

Krishna Kanta Handiqui State Open University (KKHSOU) soon accepting applications for various undergraduate and postgraduate programs for the academic year 2024.

Interested candidates must fill out the KKHSOU Admission application form within the specified deadline.

Before applying, it is essential to check the eligibility criteria for the desired program.

The application form can be accessed online on the official KKHSOU website (www.kkhsou.in).

While filling out the form, candidates must attach scanned copies of required documents, passport-size photographs, and signatures.

The application fee can be paid online using debit cards, credit cards, or net banking.

After submission, candidates should print out the application form as the university provides a login ID and password for future reference.

Reviewing all details on the application form before submitting it is crucial.

The fee structure remains the same for existing students seeking re-admission.

Late fees may be applicable for applications submitted after the specified deadline.

KKHSOU Admission 2024 Application Fees

The KKHSOU Admission (Krishna Kanta Handique State Open University) has a straightforward application fee structure for its courses. These fees ensure a smooth application process for prospective students.

How to Fill the KKHSOU 2024 Application Form?

To fill out the KKHSOU application form, follow these steps:

Visit the official website of KKHSOU admission at www.kkhsou.in/web_new.

Locate the prospectus or information brochure in the top left corner of the page.

Gather the required documents and other essentials before starting the online application process.

Click on the “Apply Now” button corresponding to your desired course to initiate the admission process.

Create an account by providing basic information and generate a username and password.

Log in using the generated username and password.

Fill in personal details and other mandatory information.

Select the desired program.

Upload the necessary documents, including X and XII class marksheets, scorecard, transfer certificate, and a passport-size photographs.

Preview the filled form and proceed to make the payment online.

After successful submission, download the receipt for future reference.

Required Documents:

Here are the required documents for the application form:

Passport Size Photographs: Recent passport size photographs as per the specifications provided by the university.

Proof of Identity: A copy of any government-issued ID such as Aadhaar card, passport, voter ID, or driving license.

Proof of Date of Birth: Birth certificate or secondary school certificate as proof of date of birth.

Academic Transcripts: Copies of all relevant academic transcripts and mark sheets from previous educational institutions.

Degree Certificates: Copies of degree certificates for the highest qualification obtained.

Caste Certificate (if applicable): A valid caste certificate for candidates belonging to SC/ST/OBC categories.

Domicile Certificate (if applicable): A domicile certificate if applying under any state quota.

Experience Certificate (if applicable): Work experience certificates, if required for the specific course.

Migration Certificate: Migration certificate from the previous institution attended.

Transfer Certificate: Transfer certificate from the previous institution attended.

Income Certificate (if applicable): An income certificate if applying for any scholarship or fee waiver schemes.

Medical Certificate (if applicable): Medical certificate if required by the university for specific courses.

NOC from Employer (if applicable): No Objection Certificate from the employer, if the candidate is employed and applying for a course that requires such a document.

KKHSOU Admission 2024 Courses Offered

KKHSOU offers a variety of undergraduate (UG), postgraduate (PG), PhD, Diploma, B.Ed, and M.Ed courses for students to pursue their academic interests and career aspirations. Let’s explore the different courses offered by KKHSOU:

KKHSOU Admission 2024 Eligibility Criteria

KKHSOU has specific eligibility criteria for each course, ensuring that students meet the necessary requirements to pursue their desired program. The eligibility criteria vary across UG, PG, and Diploma courses, providing opportunities for students from diverse educational backgrounds to enrol in their preferred fields of study.

UG Courses:

The UG eligibility criteria at KKHSOU ensure that students who have completed their 10+2 education in various streams are eligible for admission.

PG Courses:

The eligibility criteria for Postgraduate (PG) courses at KKHSOU require candidates to have a graduation degree in the relevant discipline from a recognized university. The specific percentage requirement may vary depending on the course.

Diploma Courses:

The diploma courses offered by KKHSOU have specific eligibility criteria based on the program. Candidates applying for diploma courses should fulfill the minimum educational requirements specified by the university, such as passing the HSE/Pre-University examinations in any stream.

KKHSOU UG Admission

The university offers a diverse range of UG courses in various disciplines, allowing students to pursue their academic interests and achieve their career goals. Backed by experienced faculty and comprehensive study materials, KKHSOU UG admissions provide a platform for students to acquire knowledge and skills necessary for their personal and professional growth.

KKHSOU PG Admission

KKHSOU (Krishna Kanta Handiqui State Open University) invites applications for its diverse Postgraduate (PG) courses. With a commitment to providing flexible and accessible education, KKHSOU offers a dynamic learning environment for students to pursue advanced studies and enhance their professional skills. Join KKHSOU to embark on a transformative academic journey and unlock your potential in your chosen field of expertise.

KKHSOU PhD Admission

KKHSOU offers PhD courses in various disciplines, providing an opportunity for advanced research and academic exploration. These doctoral programs aim to develop scholars who can contribute to the existing knowledge and practice in their respective fields. The PhD program is typically three years, including coursework, with a maximum duration of six years.

KKHSOU Admission 2024 Admit Card

The KKHSOU Admission Admit Card is an important document issued by the university for eligible students to appear in the exams. It is uploaded on the official website of KKHSOU Admission. Students who meet the eligibility criteria can download their admit card.

The admit card contains details such as exam date, time, and assigned centre. It is crucial to appear for the exam per the schedule mentioned and at the assigned centre. To download the admit card, candidates can visit the official website kkhsou.in and follow the provided schedule.

How to Download the KKHSOU 2024, Admit Card?

To download the KKHSOU Admit Card from the website, follow these steps:

Visit the official website of KKHSOU, kkhsou.in.

Look for the “Important Links” section on the homepage.

Click on the link related to the admit card.

Select the examination type you are appearing for.

Enter your enrolment number, mobile number, and email address.

Click on the “Download Admit Card” button.

The admit card will be displayed on the screen.

Verify all the details printed on the admit card.

Take a printout of the admit card for future reference.

KKHSOU Admission 2024 Result

KKHSOU Admission 2024 Result will be Declared soon for PhD Courses. KKHSOU, short for Krishna Kanta Handiqui State Open University, recently released results for various courses in the first week of October 2024.

Students enrolled in semesters 1 and 2 of programs such as PGDCA, MBA, MA, BA, MA (Sociology), BBA, BCA, BSc, and D.El.Ed can conveniently check their results online through the official website of KKHSOU.

Once the results are published, the university will also issue the respective mark sheets to the students. This development brings great convenience to the students, allowing them to access their results and academic performance easily.

How to Check the KKHSOU 2024 Result?

To check the KKHSOU results online, follow the simple steps provided below:

Visit the official website of KKHSOU, which is www.kkhsou.in.

On the homepage, navigate to the “Examination Section.”

In the Examination Section, you will find two tabs: one for notices and the other for Results. Click on the “Results” tab.

Select the appropriate course of study for which you wish to check the result.

The KKHSOU result for the selected course will be displayed on the screen.

KKHSOU Admission 2024 Counseling

KKHSOU (Krishna Kanta Handiqui State Open University) conducts counseling sessions to assist prospective students in making informed decisions about their academic pursuits. The counseling process involves providing detailed information about the courses offered, eligibility criteria, admission procedures, and career opportunities. During these sessions, academic advisors and faculty members address students’ queries, guide them in selecting appropriate programs based on their interests and qualifications, and help with the application process. Counselling is a crucial step in ensuring that students choose the right path for their educational and professional goals, aligning with KKHSOU’s commitment to accessible and flexible learning. Counseling sessions are typically scheduled after the release of the merit list and prior to the final admission process.

Required Document at Verification time:

Printed Application Form: A copy of the filled application form submitted online.

Identity Proof: Government-issued ID such as an Aadhaar card, Voter ID, Passport, or Driving License.

Photographs: Recent passport-sized photographs (usually 2-3).

Educational Certificates: Original and photocopies of 10th, 12th, and Bachelor’s degree certificates and mark sheets.

Category Certificate: For SC/ST/OBC candidates, a valid caste certificate is issued by a competent authority.

Residence Certificate: Proof of residence such as utility bills, rent agreements, or domicile certificates.

Transfer Certificate (TC): Issued by the institution last attended.

Migration Certificate: Required for students coming from universities other than KKHSOU.

Character Certificate: Issued by the institution last attended.

Income Certificate: If applying for a fee concession or scholarship.

Proof of Payment: Receipt of application fee payment.

KKHSOU 2024 Admission Procedure

The admission procedure at Krishna Kanta Handique State Open University (KKHSOU) is designed to be accessible and straightforward. Prospective students can apply online through the university’s official website. The process involves filling out the application form, uploading the required documents, and paying the application fee. Admission is typically based on merit, determined by the applicant’s academic performance in qualifying examinations.

For certain courses, entrance exams and interviews may be conducted to assess candidates’ suitability. Once selected, students are notified via email and must complete the enrollment process by submitting the necessary documents and fees. KKHSOU ensures a transparent and efficient admission process to facilitate students’ entry into their desired programs.

KKHSOU Admission 2024 Facilities & Infrastructure

KKHSOU offers various facilities and infrastructure to enhance the learning experience of its students. Some of the key points regarding the facilities and infrastructure at KKHSOU are:

KKHSOU Admission 2024 Fee Structure

KKHSOU (Krishna Kanta Handique State Open University) offers various undergraduate, postgraduate, and diploma courses in various disciplines. The university provides flexible learning opportunities for students who aspire to pursue higher education. With a focus on open and distance learning, KKHSOU invites candidates to enrol in BA, BCom, BCA, MA, MBA, and more programs.

Undergraduate (UG) Courses:

Postgraduate (PG) Courses:

KKHSOU Admission 2024 Scholarships Scheme

The Krishna Kanta Handiqui State Open University (KKHSOU) provides scholarships to deserving students to encourage and support their academic pursuits. The university offers two scholarships based on merit, which are outlined below:

KKHSOU Admission 2024 Placements

KKHSOU (Krishna Kanta Handiqui State Open University) aims to empower its students through quality education and facilitate their successful transition into the professional world. The university’s placement cell plays a crucial role in assisting students with their career aspirations by connecting them with potential employers. Through collaborations with reputed companies and organizations, the university endeavours to enhance the employability of its graduates and contribute to their overall career growth.

KKHSOU Admission 2024 Faculty List

The faculty at Krishna Kanta Handique State Open University (KKHSOU) comprises distinguished professors from various departments, offering expertise and guidance to students. Each faculty member brings a wealth of knowledge and experience, ensuring a high-quality education for all learners.

KKHSOU Admission 2024 Affiliated College

Krishna Kanta Handique State Open University (KKHSOU) is associated with several colleges offering a wide range of educational programs. These affiliated colleges provide opportunities for students to pursue their academic interests in various fields of study.

Krishna Kanta Handique State Open University (KKHSOU) offers comprehensive support through its headquarters and city office, ensuring accessible communication channels for all inquiries. Here are the key contact details:

Conclusion

Krishna Kanta Handique State Open University (KKHSOU) is a pioneering institution in distance education, offering flexible learning options to students across various fields. With its commitment to quality education, innovative teaching methods, and technological advancements, KKHSOU has become a leading choice for individuals seeking accessible higher education. By empowering learners and adapting to changing needs, KKHSOU continues to shape the landscape of distance education in India.

For any other queries about KKHSOU Admission 2024, you can leave your queries below in the comment box.
